Uses of Interface
org.microbean.helm.maven.ReleaseStatusListener

    • Uses of ReleaseStatusListener in org.microbean.helm.maven

      Classes in org.microbean.helm.maven that implement ReleaseStatusListener 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractReleaseStatusListener
      A ReleaseStatusListener that logs the Tiller.GetReleaseStatusResponseOrBuilder associated with a ReleaseStatusEvent.
      Methods in org.microbean.helm.maven that return ReleaseStatusListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ReleaseStatusListener[] GetReleaseStatusMojo.getReleaseStatusListeners()
      Invokes the GetReleaseStatusMojo.getReleaseStatusListenersList() method and converts its return value to an array.
      Methods in org.microbean.helm.maven that return types with arguments of type ReleaseStatusListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<ReleaseStatusListener> GetReleaseStatusMojo.getReleaseStatusListenersList()
      Returns the List of ReleaseStatusListeners whose elements will be notified when a release version's status is retrieved.
      Methods in org.microbean.helm.maven with parameters of type ReleaseStatusListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void GetReleaseStatusMojo.addReleaseStatusListener(ReleaseStatusListener listener)
      Adds a ReleaseStatusListener that will be notified when a release version's status is retrieved
      void GetReleaseStatusMojo.removeReleaseStatusListener(ReleaseStatusListener listener)
      Removes a ReleaseStatusListener from this GetReleaseStatusMojo.
      Method parameters in org.microbean.helm.maven with type arguments of type ReleaseStatusListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void GetReleaseStatusMojo.setReleaseStatusListenersList(List<ReleaseStatusListener> releaseStatusListeners)
      Installs the List of ReleaseStatusListeners whose elements will be notified when a release version's status is retrieved.
